text: The Optare CityPacer was a step-entrance minibus, It was built by Optare from 1985 to 1992. it was built on the Volkswagen LT55 chassis.An Orphington debut for Optare CityPacer Commercial Motor 13 September 1986 == Related pages == * List of bus models == References == == Other websites == * * Optare CityPacer flickr images CityPacer Category:Minibuses Category:Step-entrance buses
title: Optare CityPacer
